CustomField.formula: IF(Hours_Since_Follow_up_Date_Time__c > 10, IMAGE("/resource/icons/Red_Triangle.png", "Red triangle", 25, 25), IF(Hours_Since_Follow_up_Date_Time__c > 5, IMAGE("/resource/icons/Yellow_Triangle.png", "Yellow triangle", 25, 25), IMAGE("/resource/icons/Green_Triangle.png", "Green triangle", 25, 25)))
CustomField.label: Alert Icon
